```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
eq1 <- function(x) {
  x^2
}

d_eq1 <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")

d_eq1_fun <- function(x) {
  2 * x
}
d_eq1_fun(3)
```

```{r}
eq2 <- function(a) {
  2*(3*a+2)^4 - 5
}

d_eq2 <- D(expr = expression(2*(3*a+2)^4 - 5), name = "a")

d_eq2_fun <- function(a) {
  2 * (4 * (3 * (3 * a + 2)^3))
}

d_eq2_fun(1.2)
```
